675e49aef18bc5241c696d05 description: Being able to aim properly is probably the most important skill you can have here in Tarkov. Let's first get some practice with iron sights, since they're always going to be avalible.
675e4aeda564b925f7e3a40b: Kill 10 enemies with only iron sights
683115c76897732c888b410a: Kill 10 enemies while aiming down sight
675e49aef18bc5241c696d05 successMT: Good shooting! Let's get you something fancier now
675e49aef18bc5241c696d05 acceptMT: Steel sights, steel bullets. ...they're lead? Darn.
675e4e80c11f6c442b45622a description: 1x sights may not give you better range, but you'll get a much clearer picture of your target, allowing for much easier aim and recoil control. Find one you like and use it as much as you can!
683115f53e269d99e653674c: Kill 30 enemies while aiming down sight
675e4e80c11f6c442b45622a successMT: Do you prefer reflex or holographic sights? Personally, I'm more of a reflex sight guy, I like the little dots over the bigger designs of holographics. Both have their perks though, don't let me sway you either way.
675e4e80c11f6c442b45622a acceptMT: If the sight is a 1x sight, why does my vision scope in? Tarkov is a weird place
675e5078844896fca88d21f8 description: 2x sights are a great choice for those quasi-close quarters engagememts. It's a shame only two of them made their way to Tarkov. Oh well. Let's make this one a bit more interesting, try putting a bit of distance between you and your opponent.
675e514227a7c600005fc261: Kill 30 enemies over 20 meters away with 2x sights
675e5078844896fca88d21f8 successMT: Did you end up liking either of the two? If you didn't, you never have to use them again.
675e5078844896fca88d21f8 acceptMT: Twice the range, twice the killing
675e51df3230ec7bd5c88a52 description: All this time holding the gun steady in front of your face... it's not the only way to shoot. In fact, it's not always the best way to shoot. Sometimes it's better if you know where your bullets are gonna go without looking through a sight. Let's see if your point fire is as good as your aimed fire.
675e52451d1fc9a22c1872c3: Kill 40 enemies while hip / point firing
683fe6bee6fd366a89d47d05: Kill an enemy while blind firing
675e51df3230ec7bd5c88a52 successMT: Ah, so you are actually pointing your gun in the right spot. Very good.
675e51df3230ec7bd5c88a52 acceptMT: I mean, it's kind of aiming.
6832b19e78045ca545407ba2 description: Does it get tiring holding that gun up all the time? Espeically if you're waiting for the other person to come to you, you could run out of stamina at the wrong time... you should try bracing your weapon against something. A wall, a box, a bipod, a ledge, there's a lot of places you can set up. Helps with the recoil too! Go give that a try.
6832b19e78045ca545407ba2 successMT: Did that provide a bit of a rest for your arms? Mounting has its drawbacks, but it does have real advantages as well. Know when it's best to be mobile and when it's best to hunker down!
6832b19e78045ca545407ba2 acceptMT: Lemme grab a tent while I'm at it.
675e52a13b41d2db126a9faa description: Tarkov is quite a big place, don't you think? Plenty of areas have vast landscapes as far as the eye can see. There's plenty of land for a large scope to look over.
675e52dae6f6ce55e072ebdb: Kill 50 enemies over 70 away with 6x+ sights
675e52a13b41d2db126a9faa successMT: Did you find some good spots for LDS?
675e56b03a1ae2aed78bf8cc description: Assault rifles are the most plentiful catagory of weapons in Tarkov, and more seem to be getting shipped in. They're also the most balanced, being usable in any distance. That means, if you have to pick one type of weapon to use, assault rifles makes the most sense. Let's get you started.
675e56c59f8e3bb097b60089: Kill 20 enemies with an Assault Rifle
675e56b03a1ae2aed78bf8cc successMT: They're good, right? It's a shame they're usually on the expensive side.
675e56b03a1ae2aed78bf8cc acceptMT: Anything full auto is good with me
675e5a30dec56e94925867b1 description: You seem pretty interested in assault rifles, eh? Let's make sure you know where to shoot. Center mass is going to be your best bet with AR's, unless you're confident in your headshots. Don't bother with the limbs, and try to avoid flesh ammo for this.
6832272161690cf6f736a4f6: Land 200 thorax or stomach shots with an Assault Rifle
675e5abe6eaece1bb6527691: Land 30 headshots with an Assault Rifle
675e5a30dec56e94925867b1 successMT: Was armor giving you a lot of trouble? Ammo matters more than guns here. Make sure what you're loading up can pierce medium armors!
675e5a30dec56e94925867b1 acceptMT: Biggest target, best chance to hit
675e5a8c45c7fc6de14103b6 description: The best thing about assault rifles is that they are useful in almost every situation. Excluding the extreme ranges, you will find your rifle able to stand its ground anywhere. You're probably used to medium range, so let's see how you do in close and long range.
675e5adec3794d962a05929d: Kill 15 enemies within 15 meters with an Assault rifle.
6832260b73e34ad68ed0f2ff: Kill 15 enemies beyond 80 meters with an Assault rifle.
675e5a8c45c7fc6de14103b6 successMT: Did you end up using full-auto for close, and semi-auto for long? Or maybe your favorite rifle is only semi auto!
675e5a8c45c7fc6de14103b6 acceptMT: I know some good places to do this.
675e5af09847ce469ccd1303 description: Surely you've run into the goons by now, right? That Knight guy is quite a boss, rushing without fear. Why don't you show him who's the real boss around here? Take him out, and use one of his own guns to do it.
675e5a78bb96716295a4564f: Kill Knight with a SCAR-H, MDR 7.62, MK47, OR MCX-SPEAR 6.8
675e5af09847ce469ccd1303 successMT: And the pawn moves D2 to take the knight!
675e5af09847ce469ccd1303 acceptMT: I'm taking his mask, as well...
675e5bc00b41be5ccf6f766a name: Master of firearms: Assault rifles / Carbines
675e5bc00b41be5ccf6f766a description: You won't believe how many of these things there are in Tarkov. They keep shipping new ones in too! I have to keep up with that if I can... why are there so many Kalashnikovs, anyways? Oh well. Since there's so many, let's group them up by caliber and fire modes. So, weapons that can ONLY do single fire will be seperated from those that can do full auto. Ah, as a bonus, I want to see a couple extreme range kills as well as a few extremely close range kills.
683246e2ff8531e232f730df: Kill a PMC with the MCX-SPEAR
683246e1b76e3a929b0ea2ea: Kill a PMC with the ASh-12
6832461495efc5c45d483d76: Kill a PMC with the VPO-209
6832464dd2c03159e2ce4d6d: Kill a PMC with the SVT-40
6832464cb8b6f95907ca7b76: Kill a PMC with the AVT-40
683248a247a7245e4ac3a523: Kill 20 enemies within 8 meters with Assault rifles
683248a84ecd842d4bd1e491: Kill 10 enemies beyond 125 meters with Assault rifles
675e5bc00b41be5ccf6f766a successMT: You should be able to pick up any assault rifle you come across and use it like a master! Very good job.
675e5bc00b41be5ccf6f766a acceptMT: Well, that's a lot of work.
675e6645c17fb770df3444e1 description: Designated Marksman Rifles are a great hybrid weapon. You get most of the power of a bolt-action sniper rifle, and most of the versatility of an assault rifle. Let's get familiar with them, shall we?
675e6645c17fb770df3444e1 successMT: Nice shots! The semi auto makes them a bit less desirable at close quarters, but the high damage and slow ammo consumption also makes it beneficial.
675e6645c17fb770df3444e1 acceptMT: Powerful, accurate, can fire quickly... these are good.
675e6741df530679dfa8ef46 name: Shot through the heart. Yes, you're to blame.
675e6741df530679dfa8ef46 description: Since DMRs fire high caliber rounds, you should only be shooting vitals. 2 to the thorax, or 1 to the head will put down most targets that aren't heavily armored. Show me you know where to aim!
675e67a055b3b21df665b596: Land 75 shots on the thorax with a DMR
675e6741df530679dfa8ef46 successMT: Yeah, just like that. Keep doing that, you're gonna have an easy time.
675e67804ec1c53a5dff7630 description: Marksman rifles assume there's a marksman in you... not only does this mean that you defeat your targets properly, but that you know when it is time to disengage. I have a special challenge for you: Kill a certain number of people in one raid, while staying below a damage threshold. You might want a secondary weapon to protect you on your way to extract once its done.
6832553b9377fe8ad8412294: Kill 7 enemies with DMRs in one raid, without exceeding 800 DMR damage.
675e67804ec1c53a5dff7630 successMT: Pretty good shooting there, friend. It's good for your bank account too, y'know. Less bullets used = less money spent.
675e67804ec1c53a5dff7630 acceptMT: Now how do I want to go about this...
675e67c8ac30b26478d3c0b3 description: If you want to be a good marksman, it might be worth taking a few notes from that guy watching over the sawmill in Woods. Why don't you go show him that you're better at spotting than he is?
675e676647b8e13978be08a9: Kill Shturman with an SVDS or a G28
675e67c8ac30b26478d3c0b3 successMT: Nice shots! The semi auto makes them a bit less desirable at close quarters, but the high damage and slow ammo consumption also makes it beneficial.
675e68435fe53beaade07c06 name: Master of firearms: Designated Marksman Rifles (part 1)
675e68435fe53beaade07c06 description: Don't you wish there were more DMRs in Tarkov? Such a nice weapon type... oh well. Since there's so few, you gotta use each of them.
675e6872e25b06421dcdcece: Kill 15 PMCs with the HK G28
675e68435fe53beaade07c06 successMT: Nowhere is safe from your eye. Beautiful shooting, mate.
675e68435fe53beaade07c06 acceptMT: Where am I gonna get that MK-18?
6832593a4351b59eb1db5bdd name: Master of firearms: Designated Marksman Rifles (part 2)
6832593a4351b59eb1db5bdd description: Remember that special challenge I had for you a while ago? Here's a harder version of that. You have as many tries of you need. Aim high, aim well, and good luck!
6832594bdf1c0052ec39c0b6: Kill 15 enemies with DMRs in one raid, without exceeding 1000 DMR damage.
6832593a4351b59eb1db5bdd successMT: Oh my, that was quite something. You did a very good job controlling your fire.
6832593a4351b59eb1db5bdd acceptMT: Oh dear, there is little room for error here.
675e6bc9e4c92c46a57ef4ea description: Some new LMGS around here recently, you noticed? High caliber as well, rather deadly... Why not learn how to use them?
675e6bc9e4c92c46a57ef4ea successMT: How's the weight? They really aren't being very truthful when they call it 'light', are they?
675e6c4e5f5c048d625b3120 description: You know what's great about an LMG? You can just keep firing that sucker. That means any place is good for shooting, cause they're gonna fall eventually. Go shoot a bunch of people. Cause it's fun. Or something. Who caused this, again? The fall of humanity has really led to some interesting places.
675e6c4e5f5c048d625b3120 successMT: 300 new holes were created. Do what you will with this information. Just know that He is watching.
675e6c8b2f7bd46d0b83b941 description: Have you ever tried mounting those things? They're so heavy, having something to rest is on should be quite useful to you... go give it a try.
675e6c945c3f87aef8315448: Kill 30 enemies while mounted with an LMG
675e6c8b2f7bd46d0b83b941 successMT: Much less recoil, less stamina usage... it does leave you stationary, but that's ok sometimes! Just hope they don't have a grenade and you're fine.
675e6ccb713a4e51b21ff53d description: You know who else uses an LMG around here? Killa. That name is feared everywhere, so I've heard. You should have nothing to fear, being unable to die. Go knock him out, with his own weapon.
675e6ccb713a4e51b21ff53d successMT: The shops of the Interchange mall are much safer now. He'll be back though, just like you. Isn't it weird how they seem to 'respawn' as well? Quite a cursed game someone is playing here in Tarkov.
675e6ccb713a4e51b21ff53d acceptMT: I should bring proper ammo for this...
675e6f08f49ff2d6fb3f2761 name: Master of firearms: Light Machine Guns
675e6f08f49ff2d6fb3f2761 description: Can you believe how few LMGs there are in Tarkov? I thought more would have arrived by now... I suppose there's 6, now. You know what that means, though... gonna be using each one quite a lot. Also, you should utilize mounting some more. See if you can find some good spots for it!
675e6efce6a8ff05da909c34: Kill 20 PMCs with the M60(E4 or E6)
6832b16cddea73db1ae3e70d: Kill 100 enemies while mounted with an LMG
675e6f08f49ff2d6fb3f2761 successMT: You really know how to lock it down, well done! Defense is yours
675e6f08f49ff2d6fb3f2761 acceptMT: Gonna need a lot of big bullets for this
675e70d09b7c88c3fec59dfd description: I don't care for melee weapons. They don't do you much good here, for some reason. Apparently stabbing someone in the face is only a minor inconvinence to them, and they're not much payoff. However, you're also choosing to do this, so whatever. Go stab three people, you psychopath.
675e70e9c3b45adfb4598d4c: Kill 3 enemies with a melee weapon
675e72d20b9ddd863c120f72 description: Actually getting a melee is extremely tricky, unless you have the armour of a battleship, or you can disable your enemy. Luckily, you can disable your enemy.
675e72f3149d28e602c76823: Melee 4 enemies that are stunned by a flash grenade.
675e72d20b9ddd863c120f72 successMT: That's the best strategy if you're going to melee. Keep doing that.
675e733e60312dc58b9f59d8 description: The only place that's going to be any use to melee someone is the head. Go bonk someone on the head a few times.
675e7376c6e180e4865927a1: Hit an enemy in the head with a melee weapon 10 times
675e733e60312dc58b9f59d8 successMT: That's how you do it. Good bonking
675e73871db93c937c1b50b5 description: Time to have some fun with it, eh? Make sure you get a couple real guys as well.
675e73871db93c937c1b50b5 successMT: Alright, Jack, that's enough. Only one last thing to do.
675e73871db93c937c1b50b5 acceptMT: Might be a bit more difficult. I'll bring plenty of stun grenades
675e73d3713cf5e93492c992 description: You're still working on your melee weapons, are ya? Well then, allow me to give you the biggest challenge I can give. There is a boss here in Tarkov that also uses a melee weapon. I'm sure you know who it is. I learned something, if you can kill him with a melee weapon, you'll be able to take his hammer. How's that sound?
675e73f48908ad7df9117f49: Kill Tagilla with a melee weapon
675e73d3713cf5e93492c992 successMT: Very impressive! Enjoy the new hammer, Jack. Though something that rips would be more your style, eh? Ah well. (WARNING: You normally do not have access to this hammer, so while it *technically* works, your character model will freak out and the 'stab' attack does not work. It's really fun though, and holding it actually gives you a speed boost for some reason. Use at your own risk!)
675e73d3713cf5e93492c992 acceptMT: A dance with the devil, eh?
675e778f31dbe88e73a2e388 description: Pistols aren't the best choice for most situations, especially if you seperate pistols and revolvers. However, their small size means you can bring one in addition to a main weapon without any issue. They are also quite cheap, and are found frequently. Let's make sure that you'll be able to switch to an effective weapon.
675e778f31dbe88e73a2e388 successMT: Always remember: Switching to your sidearm is faster than reloading
675e77e906c047fb4cf0e456 description: Pistols aren't that great for killing, but they're great for softening up targets, crippling them, leaving then vulenrable for you to finish off later. That being said, any bullet to a head will do just fine. Let's try shooting head, thorax, and legs with these.
675e77e906c047fb4cf0e456 successMT: As you can see, no pistol is effective against medium-high armor, except maybe the 5-7 with the best ammo... but legs can't be armored, making them a great target. The exception to this rule is the Glock18C, which spits out bullets so ungodly fast that it just kinda works anyways. Watch the recoil!
675e78667a9c44652a0905dd description: You really shouldn't be using a pistol beyond close range. Pistols aren't designed for that. Really, they are a self defense weapon in CQB situations. Let's see if you can use it as intended.
6832c2930729cfbe008cabd7: Kill 20 enemies within 15 meters with pistols
675e78667a9c44652a0905dd successMT: Works pretty well up close, right? To be fair, almost anything does... Oh well.
675e78667a9c44652a0905dd acceptMT: I own a musket for home defense, actually...
675e78bab4c40de05cc0c7c3 description: There's no boss in Tarkov that 'uses' a pistol, but there is a boss that has one. A golden one, in fact. Show him that the pistol is better without the greed infused into it, will you?
675e78d95c7cb9c1a1d269b3: Kill Reshala with the TT (cannot be the Gold varient)
675e78bab4c40de05cc0c7c3 successMT: Well done! I think Jaeger will want that golden pistol, if you grabbed it.
675e78bab4c40de05cc0c7c3 acceptMT: Good thing he doesn't wear armor.
675e7975aa916302e1a4d7db description: Ooooo, so you still want to improve your pistol skill??? Sounds good to me. How about 5 with each one? Little less than the others, being a sidearm and all that. ...Eh, group all those semi-auto 9x19s together. Use them at point-blank instead.
675e79af4a3c26946af52845: Kill 5 PMCs with the APB or APS
675e7a813c3bd7e200df0416: Kill 5 PMCs with the PM or PM (t)
675e7a9a4923964fc4c384b0: Kill 5 PMCs with the TT (either one)
675e7ab4534808a02aa95e7d: Kill an enemy with the Blicky (Might wanna hurt them first...)
675e7af693d419045e26ae40: Kill 5 PMCs with the .357 Desert Eagle
675e7b13e4707b7ecde7c8fe: Kill 5 PMCs with a .50 AE Desert Eagle
6832c43b930303f0e6e48c2d: Kill 50 enemies within 10 meters with pistols
675e7975aa916302e1a4d7db successMT: Very well done!! Your ability with pistols is unlike any other. And you even got one with the toy gun? How on earth did you manage that?
675e7975aa916302e1a4d7db acceptMT: I sure hope I find PMCs without helmets, because some of these pistols are gonna suck to use...
RC1 description: Ah, so you want to work on your recoil control? The recoil is good enough now, I thought. Oh well, why not reduce it even further. Get used to how guns feel without a foregrip, first
RC1 successMT: Harder to control, right? Next one should be easier.
RC2 description: One of the best ways to increase your recoil control is with a foregrip. It gives you a much better way to hold your gun than simply grabbing the handguard from the underside. Put one on and see if it makes a difference!
RC2 successMT: Much easier to control? Good. Now let's have some REAL fun,
RC2 acceptMT: This will be the only fun one, won't it...
GL_C_RC3 description: Stocks are an invaluable tool when it comes to assisting in recoil control. Instead of leaving it all to your hands, your shoulder and really your entire body can help absorb it. Let's take that away, shall we? You have to use an assault rifle, by the way. No cheating by using something that already has no stock!
GL_C_RC3 task1: Kill 25 enemies with an assault rifle without a stock
GL_C_RC3 successMT: Was that harder than you expected? I told you, stocks are really important.
GL_C_RC4 description: Remember how we talked about the two main ways to increase recoil control? You can't use either of them now. Still have to use an assault rifle, by the way,
GL_C_RC4 task1: Kill 35 enemies with an assault rifle without a stock or foregrip
GL_C_RC4 successMT: Hahahahaha... oh, you are so not ready for the next task. You shouldn't have completed this one, now you're in for it.
GL_C_RC4 acceptMT: Wait... what's the last task going to be, if this is the fourth?
GL_C_RC5 description: Stocks. Foregrips. Both important, right? You poor soul. Use every single one. You have to kill a PMC as well, no picking on the scavs. Enjoy the suffering!
GL_C_RC5 task1: Kill a pmc with the PKP polymer stock
GL_C_RC5 task2: Kill a pmc with the PK Zenit PT-2 'Klassika' stock
GL_C_RC5 task3: Kill a pmc with the PKM wooden stock
GL_C_RC5 task4: Kill a pmc with the SR-2M folding stock
GL_C_RC5 task5: Kill a pmc with the SR-2MP folding stock
GL_C_RC5 task6: Kill a pmc with the AK 100-series metal skeletonized stock
GL_C_RC5 task7: Kill a pmc with the AI AXMC AX buttstock
GL_C_RC5 task8: Kill a pmc with the TOZ-106 FAB Defense GPCP cheek rest
GL_C_RC5 task9: Kill a pmc with the Strike Industries Viper PDW stock
GL_C_RC5 task10: Kill a pmc with the Benelli M3 telescopic stock
GL_C_RC5 task11: Kill a pmc with the Benelli M3 Mesa Tactical Urbino stock
GL_C_RC5 task12: Kill a pmc with the SB Tactical SBA3 brace
GL_C_RC5 task13: Kill a pmc with the CNC Guns OV-SV98 M12B stock
GL_C_RC5 task14: Kill a pmc with the HK G36 polymer stock
GL_C_RC5 task15: Kill a pmc with the HK G36 KV adjustable stock
GL_C_RC5 task16: Kill a pmc with the MP-18 polymer stock
GL_C_RC5 task17: Kill a pmc with the MP-18 wooden stock
GL_C_RC5 task18: Kill a pmc with the AKM/AK-74 Hera Arms CQR47 pistol grip/buttstock
GL_C_RC5 task19: Kill a pmc with the FN SCAR cheek rest
GL_C_RC5 task20: Kill a pmc with the FN SCAR folding polymer stock
GL_C_RC5 task21: Kill a pmc with the FN SCAR retractable polymer stock
GL_C_RC5 task22: Kill a pmc with the FN SCAR rubber buttpad
GL_C_RC5 task23: Kill a pmc with the HK Adjustable Buttstock
GL_C_RC5 task24: Kill a pmc with the HK Adjustable Buttstock cheek rest
GL_C_RC5 task25: Kill a pmc with the HK417 E2 buttstock
GL_C_RC5 task26: Kill a pmc with the MP-43-1C buttpad
GL_C_RC5 task27: Kill a pmc with the MTs-255-12 wooden stock
GL_C_RC5 task28: Kill a pmc with the AR-15 Hera Arms CQR pistol grip/buttstock
GL_C_RC5 task29: Kill a pmc with the AKM/AK-74 ProMag Archangel OPFOR AA47 buttstock
GL_C_RC5 task30: Kill a pmc with the MP-155 walnut stock
GL_C_RC5 task31: Kill a pmc with the MP-155 Ultima recoil pads
GL_C_RC5 task32: Kill a pmc with the MP-155 Ultima polymer stock
GL_C_RC5 task33: Kill a pmc with the CMMG RipStock buttstock
GL_C_RC5 task34: Kill a pmc with the Strike Industries Viper Mod 1 stock
GL_C_RC5 task35: Kill a pmc with the PPSh-41 stock
GL_C_RC5 task36: Kill a pmc with the SVDS polymer stock
GL_C_RC5 task37: Kill a pmc with the AR-15 HK E1 buttstock
GL_C_RC5 task38: Kill a pmc with the MPX/MCX PMM ULSS foldable stock
GL_C_RC5 task39: Kill a pmc with the MPX/MCX Maxim Defense CQB telescoping stock
GL_C_RC5 task40: Kill a pmc with the AR-15 ADAR 2-15 wooden stock
GL_C_RC5 task41: Kill a pmc with the FAB Defense GLR-16-S stock
GL_C_RC5 task42: Kill a pmc with the AK-12 stock
GL_C_RC5 task43: Kill a pmc with the Mosin Rifle AIM Sports Recoil Pad
GL_C_RC5 task44: Kill a pmc with the AR-15 HK Slim Line buttstock
GL_C_RC5 task45: Kill a pmc with the HK MP7A1 stock
GL_C_RC5 task46: Kill a pmc with the HK MP7A2 stock
GL_C_RC5 task47: Kill a pmc with the SA-58 humpback polymer stock
GL_C_RC5 task48: Kill a pmc with the SA-58 SPR stock
GL_C_RC5 task49: Kill a pmc with the SA-58 folding stock
GL_C_RC5 task50: Kill a pmc with the SA-58 BRS stock
GL_C_RC5 task51: Kill a pmc with the SA-58/FAL Magpul PRS 2 polymer stock
GL_C_RC5 task52: Kill a pmc with the AKM/AK-74 Magpul Zhukov-S stock
GL_C_RC5 task53: Kill a pmc with the ERGO F93 PRO stock
GL_C_RC5 task54: Kill a pmc with the Vltor EMOD stock
GL_C_RC5 task55: Kill a pmc with the M14 SAGE International M14ALCS (MOD-0) stock
GL_C_RC5 task56: Kill a pmc with the AK-74M polymer stock (6P34 Sb.15)
GL_C_RC5 task57: Kill a pmc with the AKMSN shoulder piece (6P4N Sb.1-19)
GL_C_RC5 task58: Kill a pmc with the AKS-74 metal skeletonized stock (6P21 Sb.5)
GL_C_RC5 task59: Kill a pmc with the FAB Defense GL-SHOCK buttstock
GL_C_RC5 task60: Kill a pmc with the FAB Defense GL-SHOCK buttstock
GL_C_RC5 task61: Kill a pmc with the Magpul MOE Carbine stock
GL_C_RC5 task62: Kill a pmc with the HK MP5 A2 stock
GL_C_RC5 task63: Kill a pmc with the Magpul MOE Carbine rubber buttpad
GL_C_RC5 task64: Kill a pmc with the HK MP5 A3 old model stock
GL_C_RC5 task65: Kill a pmc with the Magpul PRS GEN2 stock (FDE)
GL_C_RC5 task66: Kill a pmc with the High Standard M4SS Stock
GL_C_RC5 task67: Kill a pmc with the AKMS shoulder piece (6P4 Sb.1-19)
GL_C_RC5 task68: Kill a pmc with the Magpul UBR GEN2 stock
GL_C_RC5 task69: Kill a pmc with the SOK-12 AK-style stock
GL_C_RC5 task70: Kill a pmc with the MFT BUS stock
GL_C_RC5 task71: Kill a pmc with the AK Zenit PT-3 'Klassika' stock
GL_C_RC5 task72: Kill a pmc with the AK Zenit PT-1 'Klassika' stock

GL_C_RC5 successMT: I can't believe you actually did this. Are you insane? What the heck. You must really, really care about recoil control. Well, good job. ...you want something for it? What, I'm an angel. Uhm... here, there's a little something in the corner of your shelter you never noticed. Go grab that.
675e7bb9a29a9242665cb6de description: Revolvers are an interesting weapon for sure. They're the size of a pistol, but most pack the punch of a sniper rifle. The cost is, well, literal monetary cost, as well as recoil and ammo capacity. Every shot counts here!
675e7bb9a29a9242665cb6de successMT: Nice aim! Make sure you're hitting important places, not much worth in shooting the arms here or legs here.
675e7c28ab10a437be2f8c7b description: Due to low ammo capacity, you really have to hit important stuff with revolvers. You should only be aiming for the head and thorax, you don't have enough ammo to kill quickly through the flesh, even with specialized ammo.
675e7c28ab10a437be2f8c7b successMT: Yep, that's about it. See ya.
675e7c28ab10a437be2f8c7b acceptMT: Happy to take him out, actually
675e7c632c112b09b8ca85b8 description: You know those old western movies where they just take the revolver right out of the holster and fire without hardly aiming. Yeah, it's kinda cool, kinda silly. But 'point firing' is actually a very useful thing. Revolvers seem like a good thing to practice with! ...Hey, speaking of cowboy movies...
683371d9994b5c3ec5a270e6: Kill 30 enemies with revolvers while point / hip firing
675e7d991baa549533f01457: Kill 10 enemies with revolvers while wearing the Kinda Cowboy hat
675e7c632c112b09b8ca85b8 successMT: It's highhhhh noon. Actually, it's probably midnight. You're playing Tarkov, admit it.
675e7d3553464ec26df97607 description: You know the military reserve base, correct? There's this squad of guys that acts like they own the place, it's kind of annoying. Put a round through him, make sure he remembers it when he respawns.
675e7d3553464ec26df97607 successMT: Well done! He'll be keeping an eye out for you from now on, that's for sure.
675e7d3553464ec26df97607 acceptMT: Happy to take him out, actually
675e7db469cbd38e5f4c0c16 description: This likely isn't your first T5 weapon challenge, so I'll spare you the details. I'm gonna let you off easy on the 200ds here, but to make up for it, I expect very high kill counts for the RSh-12, got it?
68337397e77e7ff33b47b8c4: Kill 60 enemies with revolvers while point / hip firing
683373981bb1574b70d6c4fb: Kill 30 enemies with revolvers while wearing the Kinda Cowboy hat
675e7db469cbd38e5f4c0c16 successMT: Master of the sidearms! Great job.
675e7db469cbd38e5f4c0c16 acceptMT: This makes the third quest in Tarkov that requires cowboy hats. Interesting.
675f10ec444183edfe380e00 description: Despite how big Tarkov is, there's still plenty of buildings and other small areas. If you want to dominate CQC, shotguns are the way to go. Slugs, buckshots, flechettes, plenty of ammo choices, all extremely deadly. Don't forget that you're locked in single fire!
6833c4da76050692568b2120: Inflict 1500 damage to enemies with shotguns
675f10ec444183edfe380e00 successMT: Do you prefer pump actions or semi-autos? Pump action is more satisfying, but semi-auto is more effective.
675f10ec444183edfe380e00 acceptMT: One of the more satisfying weapon catagories
675f1123a9ae958e9716e16e description: Shotguns are great because just about everywhere you can shoot will be effective one way or another. Legs will chew through quickly, but plenty of ammo will also get through any armor just by breaking it down. The only real 'bad' place to shoot is the arms, it just doens't do enough damage. Practice shooting everywhere but the arms (you'll probably hit the arms anyways, going for thorax)
675f119efe49c83b17eea1e7: Land 150 thorax or stomach shots with shotguns (each pellet counts!)
675f11ac79f75c0698367f65: Land 300 leg shots with shotguns (each pellet counts!)
675f1123a9ae958e9716e16e successMT: Shotguns are deadly, aren't they? They're vicious, even at medium ranges. Keep aiming in that middle third, and you'll be all good.
675f116b93022a000de71964 description: Shotguns are great because just about everywhere you can shoot will be effective one way or another. Legs will chew through quickly, but plenty of ammo will also get through any armor just by breaking it down. The only real 'bad' place to shoot is the arms, it just doens't do enough damage. Practice shooting everywhere but the arms (you'll probably hit the arms anyways, going for thorax)
683376b8e4c55f5894130553: Deal 1000 damage to enemy armour with shotguns
675f116b93022a000de71964 successMT: Nicely done! Most slugs aren't too effective against armour, but some buckshot and especially the flechette rounds just disentegrate it.
675f11c1f4909a5a85d61000 description: That factory is quite the death trap, isn't it? Nowhere to hide, all close quarters, and the boss there is an absolute menace with his Saiga-12.    ...hmm... what if you became the boss of factory?
675f11c1f4909a5a85d61000 successMT: You da real boss now! Good stuff, man. Own that factory
675f11c1f4909a5a85d61000 acceptMT: That's a lot of health to chew through with a shotgun...
675f1210b9608eaeb3b06cf2 description: Alright, you know what to do. Every shotgun. Paint the world red. Let's get 15 with each, alright? Hmm... You can combine the 153 and 155, I don't mind. And just get 5 on the toz. Shred some armour for me in the meantime! Watching numbers go up is fun, for some reason.
675f1241bab1970848669abf: Kill 15 pmcs with the M3 Super 90
675f12a874f0edd9e1bf9530: Kill 15 pmcs with the Saiga-12 (semi or auto)
683376d5192aaab39065c7b2: Deal 4000 damage to enemy armour with shotguns
675f1210b9608eaeb3b06cf2 successMT: Truly an artist, you are! You are the master of shotguns
675f1210b9608eaeb3b06cf2 acceptMT: 155 with the 155... oh, I have to use all of them? Oh well.
675f1d11d6272e7d3db6ecdb description: Submachine guns are an excellect choice for Tarkov. They are perfect for close quarters, yet can perform decently at medium range. They aren't great for armor penetration, but their high fire rate makes up for it. Depending on the SMG, the recoil can range from rough to non-existent. Good luck!
68340f6d27a8db0b09539c08: Inflict 1500 damage to enemies with submachine guns
675f1d11d6272e7d3db6ecdb successMT: How's it feel? Small, hopefully controllable, easy to handle, it's a great to shoot. It's a shame it doesn't do as much damage, though.
675f1d11d6272e7d3db6ecdb acceptMT: Sarah Michelle Gellar? Oh, Sub Machine Gun, ok.
675f1d7dcd48c98ba19d329d name: Sweep the legs, or drill the chest
675f1d7dcd48c98ba19d329d description: Sub machine guns, with maaybe the exception of the P90, are pretty weak against any high level armour. That means leg shots are going to be the main source of killing when it comes to these things. However, not everyone has good armour, and even those with good armour still have holes in that protection, so thorax shots are perfectly fine as well. And of course, a few headshots never hurt. Get on it.
675f1d7dcd48c98ba19d329d successMT: Good recoil control. Legs are pretty easy to munch through with the right stuff, eh?
675f1e3e7df12a561797e9d0 description: So, truly... if you're using an SMG, you're most likely going for the legs. Yes, there are a few exceptions that can deal with mid-level armour, but you're going for the squishy bits most of the time. You know a place that can't be armoured (for some reason)? Yep, same as last time. Knock 'em over!
675f1e3e7df12a561797e9d0 successMT: Good recoil control. Legs are pretty easy to munch through with the right stuff, eh?
675f1eeef00aecbfe2ce2864 description: That Sanitar guy... man. You have not seen what he has done, let me tell you. Normally, these boss hunting missions are just a fun challenge, but this... I need you to put this guy down. I know he'll revive, he always does, but put him down anyways. His... 'work' on God's creations are unholy. Kill him with his own gun, I want him to remember this.
675f1dc66ecdf14174049903: Kill Sanitar with SPECIFICALLY the Kedr-B (others will not count!)
675f1eeef00aecbfe2ce2864 successMT: Thank you. I know he'll be back, but, I'm glad we could at least do that.
675f1eeef00aecbfe2ce2864 acceptMT: I don't think I want to know.
675f20613c445e740cccc65a description: Haven't had enough yet? Alright, let's see you use a lot of those SMGs on the real guys then! I won't be too picky on similar smgs, but I want you to obliterate every leg that isn't your own.
675f21431d9fef06520ed343: Kill 10 PMCs with the MP7 (A1 OR A2)
675f21f6aeaf154aef2d01c0: Kill 10 PMCs with the PP-9 Klin
675f221f5966269208fbb0c4: Kill 10 PMCs with the PP-91 Kedr OR Kedr-B (91-01)
675f1531c304f0dbfa6d7cf8: Kill 10 PMCs with the IMI UZI (NOT PRO)
675f153d855f25283352fc71: Kill 10 PMCs with either of the IMI UZI PRO's
675f20613c445e740cccc65a successMT: Master of the SMGs! That was quite a lot of PMC kills, well done. Take a break.
675f239281e627eeb22cf704 description: Bolt action Sniper rifles are the most deadly single-shot weapons in existance when it comes to small-arms. Their downside, obviously, is a heavy, very slow-firing, low-capacity weapon, where one shot makes or breaks it. Let's do a fun challenge this time: You have to hit headshots for this task. Aim high!
675f2425fbb32c77a3f30f86: Kill 8 enemies with headshots with sniper rifles
675f239281e627eeb22cf704 successMT: How are bolt-actions feeling for ya? It's pretty hit or miss with people... no pun intended.
675f248a8f23738f582f4cf4 description: One to the head, two to the thorax. Which will it be? Headshots are more important... but thorax will hurt them badly.
675f2595a1f5c9635998d0da: Land 15 thorax shots with sniper rifles
675f25338f6c770ec54ddf62 acceptMT: I prefer one, but sometimes two is all you can do.
675f25338f6c770ec54ddf62 description: Sniper rifles are entirely built for extreme distances. While it's still a large bullet that will hurt like heck at close range, they are meant to be accurate and deadly at ranges that no other weapon can compete in. I'll calculate some shots for you, let's build up a distance. (Explanation of this task: The distance between you and the enemy you shoot will be added to the counter. The further you are from your enemy, the faster you will complete this challenge!)
68341a14799815f5d9179694: Accumulate 4000 total shot distance with sniper rifles (see description)
675f248a8f23738f582f4cf4 acceptMT: They are long range, to be fair.
675f25c70e47562aeab94138 description: You're run into the Goons already, correct? That one guy, who makes no noise when he runs... he confuses me. You're a better sniper than him, show him that no audio won't save him.
675f24a74a05264a82602a94: Snipe Birdeye with an M700 or Sako TRG
675f25c70e47562aeab94138 successMT: Very well done! That's not easy to do. Another death for that goon
675f26cdece5e7b5f0ed152c description: Alright, sniper. Here's your final challenge: 10 PMC kills with every sniper you can find in Tarkov. Headshots aren't required, but I recommend them. Also, I want to see how much distance you can gather doing this... steady your aim, friend.
675f27811c87ad2d5f2feabf: Kill 10 PMCs with the AXMC or Sako TRG
675f27efb6fded7b54aadab4: Kill 10 PMCs with the Mosin (Infantry OR Sniper varient)
68341aa44d195ad2b7abba9c: Accumulate 40000 total shot distance with sniper rifles
675f26cdece5e7b5f0ed152c successMT: Very well done! You are now the master of the sniper rifles. Go on, marksman!
675f26cdece5e7b5f0ed152c acceptMT: 80 kills... I only need 80 shots. Eh, maybe 85.
675f2afd766594bef110bece description: Grenades can be a complete game changes, if you use them correctly. Lethal grenades, unsuprisingly, are great for blowing up your enemies. Let's try that, shall we?
675f2afd766594bef110bece successMT: Nice throw! Let's keep working on that.
675f2bb9d1eccf8833c0d8c6 description: You know what's even better than a grenade? An impact grenade. They detonate the moment they land, meaning that there's absolutely nothing your enemy can do to escape it, assuming you throw it correctly. Go give it a try.
675f2bb9d1eccf8833c0d8c6 successMT: Good throwing, man! Now let's swap to tacticals
675f2bb9d1eccf8833c0d8c6 acceptMT: Quite a rude way to kill someone, tbh
675f2c075bbac044aa287c5f description: Tactical grenades might not be able to kill an enemy outright, but it can leave them as good as dead. A good flash grenade on an enemy completely ruins them. Kill 5 enemies that can't see you.
675f2c075bbac044aa287c5f successMT: On the bright side (heh), you probably took them out with a headshot, so they didn't feel much pain. I hope you took them out with a headshot, anyways...
675f2d630fb5e018bc7f35c3 description: Lethal grenades have various fuses. Some are shorter, some are longer. Short fuses are great for suprising an enemy with a quick grenade, leaving little room for them to leave. Longer fuses are great for throwing further and bouncing around things. The M67 in partiuclar is great for baiting, as the long fuse time makes it more difficult to kill outright but will still force the enemy out. Try out the different fuse times and see what works best for you.
675f2db3afedb9672ce943de: Kill 3 enemies with grenades that have a fuse shorter than 3 seconds
675f2dd9106c5bc59e2dabc2: Kill 3 enemies with grenades that have a fuse longer than 3 seconds
675f2df4c7a8d6e8d43b4e62: Kill an enemy with the M67
675f2d630fb5e018bc7f35c3 successMT: Did you end up preferring the shorter or longer fuses? Both have their strengths and weaknesses, and are highly contextual.
675f2d630fb5e018bc7f35c3 acceptMT: Time for a little testing. With explosives.
675f2e4f391bf57a07ef72aa description: You know what time it is! Time to kill PMC with every thing in it's catagory! But you can't really kill people with flash grenades... hmm, oh well. Just kill some stunned PMCs.
67d7abf221faa2d56a5b292d: Kill 3 PMCs with the V40 Mini
675f2e4f391bf57a07ef72aa successMT: Gordon Ramsey is pleased... ahem. You're clearly quite good with grenades. Keep using them effectively now that your training is done!
675f65eb9f7bc9f7edd08f44 description: Troubleshooting is a lifesaving skill when you're in trouble. The quicker you can identify what's wrong and fix it, the higher chance you can survive a malfunction. You can just run guns that are max durability... but that can get expensive. Besides, if you ever have to pick up a gun, that's likely not going to be at full durability. This is also why it's important to play smart no matter what, as you never know when something can go wrong. Though, if something is to go wrong, you need to know what to do about it. Prove to me you can clear a malfunction.
675f65eb9f7bc9f7edd08f44 successMT: Did that malfunction happen before or after you got the kill? See, it can happen any time, and it's extremely problematic. Working on this skill is a very good idea.
675f65eb9f7bc9f7edd08f44 acceptMT: I think there are going to be some casualties in the weapons department by the end of this.
675f667df71e49587d94fcc3 description: Now that you've experienced a malfunction, let's talk about how it actually happens. There's a few different sources, but the worst offender is supressors. Some play nice with a gun, others really increase the wear and tear of a firearm. Go use the latter ones, and see what I mean.
68316efdc4511ccadf70130f: Kill 20 enemies while using a suppressor with >+70 durability burn
675f667df71e49587d94fcc3 successMT: See? Even after just a couple hours, your firearm needs some repairing now.
675f66c0fd6af76747f35f9e description: You can clear a malfunction from your favorite gun, sure. What about others? You can't use the same firearm the whole time, at least, with those traders forcing you to do a bunch of different stuff. Can you clear jams from other weapon types?
68316efb0056ef4520de3f0d: Clear a malfunction from an Assault Rifle (or Carbine)
68316e78af8fd73ab6c8a6e0: Clear a malfunction from a Designated Marksman Rifle
68316e794293800dcf0af408: Clear a malfunction from a Light Machine Gun (only RPK-16 can jam!)
68316e7a63833d3becd0ae23: Clear a malfunction from a Pistol
68316e7ae4d32f58c051debc: Clear a malfunction from a Shotgun
68316e7b2433d2cd6b1e0a7c: Clear a malfunction from a Sub Machine Gun
6835226fcd1b6b086d06b6f6: Clear a malfunction from a Sniper rifle
675f66c0fd6af76747f35f9e successMT: How about that, you can! Good, you should be surviving just fine now.
675f67cb9d050e9f3e3de0f9 description: Dust covers, suppressors, magazines... there's plenty of things that affect the durability burn and chance of malfunction. What if we combined all three of them at once? I want to show you how much these can affect the performance of a rifle..
675f67e40cea1ee8d261c5a9: Kill 10 enemies in one raid using an AKM that has no dust cover, a suppressor with >+70 durability burn, and a magazine with high or very high malfunction chance.
675f67cb9d050e9f3e3de0f9 successMT: See how bad that is for the gun? You gotta be careful what you're putting on, or taking off, your firearms.
675f67cb9d050e9f3e3de0f9 acceptMT: This thing is going to explode in my hands, I can just feel it...
675f6876a6ab9d33f2b19446 description: You know what's kinda funny? There are actually a few weapons in Tarkov that can't malfunction under any circumstance. The PPSH-41 is a shining example, but some other guns exist that will never break in this place. Go run around with them for a while as your final task.
675f689463c10e73b4d9b3d0: Kill 100 enemies with weapons that cannot suffer jams (PPSH, MP18, MP43, revolvers, and LMGs [except the RPK-16!])
675f6876a6ab9d33f2b19446 successMT: See? The accuracy decreases, sure, but they make great choices when you can't afford weapon repairs or just want to be sure that you can go for a long time with no issues.
675f69113646a559a132025f description: Underbarrel Grenade launchers are a fantastic, albiet it very expensive, way of getting a pretty free kill on an enemy. The impact explosion and propelled nature means no one is safe from an instant death. Have fun with this one!
675f6929e01aef755c647205: Kill 5 enemies with underbarrel grenade launchers.
675f69113646a559a132025f successMT: Boom! Those things are nasty, aren't they? Let's keep using them.
675f6a0cbe1f4f9221e13f2f description: The sniper scavs are quite annoying, right? They're just always there, no matter how many times you've cleared that sniper nest, they're back every raid. I don't know what's up with death not affecting Tarkov like it should. On the bright side, killing is now quite morally ambiguous! Anyways, see if we can send somewhat of a message to them. Take out 10 of them with your grenade launcher.
675f6a0cbe1f4f9221e13f2f successMT: You're getting pretty good at aiming with these things. Let's try even further out, alright?
675f6a0cbe1f4f9221e13f2f acceptMT: Seems a bit excessive, but I agree, they are annoying
675f6a62b9f0aa454d32abb1 description: So, you've seem how the grenades are propelled, yes? You know what that means... they can go quite a long distance. I want 10 kills over 100 meters away. Aim very high.
675f6a76bb03522a0bf473b2: Kill 10 enemies over 60 meters away with UBGLs
675f6a62b9f0aa454d32abb1 successMT: Quite impressive! Those were really difficult shots, great aim.
675f6a62b9f0aa454d32abb1 acceptMT: Gonna need a ruler or something for this one.
675f6970edd75c036dfa1116 description: I know the M32A1 isn't an UNDERBARREL grenade launcher, but it's a grenade launcher, ok? And it's what Mr. Big Pipe uses. You know how these go by now, you gotta do it with his own weapon. Go explode that guy straight to the next life, literally
675f69c59c67a21c2b1f9a26: Kill Big pipe with the M32A1 MSGL grenade launcher
675f6970edd75c036dfa1116 successMT: He's gonna take a while to respawn, that's for sure. Nice shot.
